abilities.SERRATED: Opponent's Critical Attacks also cause damage over time.
abilities.FOCUSED: Opponents have increased Critical Attack chance.

abilities.ABILITIES DISABLED: Player's team have one or more of their Abilities disabled.
abilities.ARSENAL: Opponents start the battle with an amount of Power.

abilities.FATIGUE: Opponent's Abilities also cause Power Drain.
abilities.RAPID-EVOLUTION: Opponents change their class periodically through the battle.

abilities.BLEED: Opponent's Abilities also cause damage over time.
abilities.IMMUTABLE: Opponent's Abilities may not be disabled.
abilities.POWER FLUCTUATION: Power Generation is increased for opponents, allowing certain Abilities to be used more frequently.

abilities.IRON-SKINNED: Opponents take less damage from specific types of attacks.
abilities.PROTECTIVE SCREEN: Each instance of damage dealt to opponents that is above a specific threshold is automatically negated and the extra damage is lost.
abilities.IMMUTABLE: Opponent's Abilities may not be disabled.
